venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
September Lean Workshop

6:30pm -  Early Bird Presentation: Customer Development 101

For those new to the concepts of Customer Development and The Lean Startup, John Prendergast, Co-organizer of the LSC Boston Meetup and CEO of Blueleaf.com will talk about the basics of customer development and lean startups at 6:30pm. Come to listen to the presentation, or hang out and network over pizza!

7pm - Craig Daniel, Co-Founder and Head Of Product at Visiblegains

 

Craig has worked at five startups in his career; some successful, some not.  He will share his experiences in the failures, particularly how he could have avoided them by using Lean Startup techniques and some common sense and intuition.  He'll tell stories about these failures and share some guiding principles so you don't make the same mistakes.

Craig Daniel is a Co-Founder and Head Of Product for VisibleGains, a SaaS company that helps B2B marketers and salespeople use content more effectively in their interactions with their prospects.  Craig is a "recovering engineer" who now loves shipping simple products with beautiful user experiences.
item.name: Lean Startup Circle Boston September Meetup
